# Welcome to RAISINS {.unnumbered}

RAISINS(**R** and **AI** **S**olutions for **IN**ferential **S**tatistics) is an advanced, user-friendly online platform for statistical analysis, seamlessly integrating the power of R, Python, and Artificial Intelligence. Specially designed for agricultural research, RAISINS enables students, researchers, and professionals to perform complex analyses and generate publication-ready results without the need for software installation or coding expertise. Simply choose your analysis module, upload your dataset, and receive instant, insightful outputs. **Before RAISINS, researchers spent at least four days completing their data analysis..now, you can do it in just four seconds!**

```{=html} 
<script>
/* confetti burst when opened */
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const details = document.getElementById("raisinsOffer");
  const canvas = document.getElementById("confettiCanvas");
  const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");

  function resizeCanvas(){
    canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
    canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
  }
  resizeCanvas();
  window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);

  function confettiBurst(){
    canvas.style.display = "block";
    const particles = Array.from({length:120}, () => ({
      x: Math.random()*canvas.width,
      y: Math.random()*-20,
      r: 4 + Math.random()*4,
      c: `hsl(${Math.random()*360},100%,60%)`,
      v: 2 + Math.random()*3
    }));
    let frame = 0;
    const interval = setInterval(()=>{
      ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
      particles.forEach(p=>{
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(p.x,p.y,p.r,0,2*Math.PI);
        ctx.fillStyle=p.c;
        ctx.fill();
        p.y+=p.v;
      });
      frame++;
      if(frame>100){ clearInterval(interval); ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height); canvas.style.display="none"; }
    },30);
  }

  details.addEventListener("toggle", ()=>{
    if(details.open){ confettiBurst(); }
  });
});
</script>
```  

## Analysis Modules {#analysis .unnumbered}

Doing a statistical analysis has never been easier. Simply select the appropriate analysis module listed [below](#analysis-module) to launch the application. Our platform operates on secure cloud infrastructure to ensure high-performance computing for your data analysis. To support sustained access and development, a modest subscription is required per module. These plans are thoughtfully structured to remain affordable for students and researchers. Once subscribed, access the app and upload your dataset and click **Run Analysis** the results are generated instantly, with accuracy and clarity.

::: {.callout-tip icon="false"}
## <i class="bi bi-eye-fill"></i> Preview Mode

Explore any app for free using <i class="bi bi-eye-fill"></i> Preview Mode ‚Äî no registration needed. Just enter your email and OTP to begin. Use this mode for Explore, teaching, training programmes or hands-on practice. To upload your own data for analysis, a subscription is required. Model datasets are available within Preview Mode.

**Making Statistics Sweet**
:::

```{=html}
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.0/css/all.min.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.4/dist/aos.css" />

<style>
#inline-counter {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 60px;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 40px auto;
  font-family: 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
}

#inline-counter .counter-box {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 14px;
  background: #fff;
  padding: 16px 28px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
  min-width: 180px;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

#inline-counter .counter-box:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
}

#inline-counter .icon {
  font-size: 30px;
  color: #007ACC;
}

#inline-counter .text-group {
  text-align: left;
}

#inline-counter .number {
  font-size: 30px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

#inline-counter .label {
  font-size: 15px;
  color: #555;
  margin-top: 4px;
}
</style>

<div id="inline-counter">
  <div class="counter-box" data-aos="fade-up">
    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-users"></i></div>
    <div class="text-group">
      <div class="number" data-target="1000">0</div>
      <div class="label">Users</div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="counter-box" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-university"></i></div>
    <div class="text-group">
      <div class="number" data-target="2">0</div>
      <div class="label">Institutions</div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="counter-box" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="200">
    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-clock"></i></div>
    <div class="text-group">
      <div class="number" data-target="10000">0</div>
      <div class="label">User Hours</div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.4/dist/aos.js"></script>
<script>
AOS.init({ once: true });

const counters = document.querySelectorAll('#inline-counter .number');

const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
  entries.forEach(entry => {
    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
      const counter = entry.target;
      const target = +counter.getAttribute('data-target');
      let count = 0;
      const speed = 5;

      const roll = () => {
        if (count < target) {
          count += Math.ceil(target / 50);
          if (count > target) count = target;
          counter.textContent = count;
          setTimeout(roll, speed);
        } else {
          counter.textContent = target.toLocaleString() + '+';
          observer.unobserve(counter);
        }
      };
      roll();
    }
  });
}, { threshold: 0.7 });

counters.forEach(counter => observer.observe(counter));
</script>
```

```{=html} 
<style>
:root{
  --navy:#1f345c; --blue:#3b77bc; --gold:#ffcc33; --amber:#ffb703; --line:#e7e2d4;
}

/* floating badge with fluid sizing via clamp() */
#rb{
  position:fixed;
  left:50%;
  bottom: calc(env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px) + 18px);
  transform:translateX(-50%);
  z-index:9998;

  display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:center; flex-wrap:wrap;
  gap: clamp(.35rem, .25rem + .6vw, .55rem);

  width:auto; max-width: min(92vw, 980px);

  /* Fluid font size */
  font: 600 clamp(.78rem, .72rem + .8vw, .92rem)/1.25 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,Arial;
  color:#102033;

  border:1px solid var(--line);
  border-radius: clamp(.8rem, .6rem + 1vw, 1.25rem);

  padding: clamp(.38rem, .3rem + .6vw, .55rem) clamp(.5rem, .4rem + .7vw, .8rem);

  /* Inner animated sheen */
  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#ffffff 0%,#fffdf2 30%,#fff3cc 50%,#fffdf2 70%,#ffffff 100%);
  background-size:200% 200%;
  animation: rbSheen 6s ease-in-out infinite;

  box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(255,183,3,0.28);
}

/* soft inner shimmer */
@keyframes rbSheen{
  0%{background-position:0% 50%;}
  50%{background-position:100% 50%;}
  100%{background-position:0% 50%;}
}

/* icon scales fluidly */
#rb .bi{
  color:var(--amber);
  font-size: clamp(.95rem, .8rem + .6vw, 1.1rem);
}

/* text block */
#rb .rb-text{
  display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:.15rem;
  max-width: clamp(48vw, 68vw, 72vw);  /* shrink gracefully on narrow screens */
  text-align:left;
}
#rb .headline em{ font-style:normal; color:var(--blue); }
#rb .instructions{
  font-weight:500;
  font-size: clamp(.78rem, .72rem + .4vw, .85rem);
  color:#333; line-height:1.25;
}
#rb .instructions small{
  color:#555;
  font-size: clamp(.7rem, .66rem + .3vw, .78rem);
}

/* CTA button (fluid) */
#rb .rb-go{
  text-decoration:none;
  background:linear-gradient(135deg,var(--navy),#2a4c86);
  color:#fff;
  border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.2);
  border-radius:999px;
  padding: clamp(.3rem, .26rem + .4vw, .42rem) clamp(.5rem, .46rem + .5vw, .78rem);
  font-weight:800;
  font-size: clamp(.8rem, .76rem + .4vw, .86rem);
  display:flex; align-items:center; gap:.35rem; white-space:nowrap;
  transition:all .2s ease;
}
#rb .rb-go::after{ content:"‚Üó"; font-weight:800; opacity:.85; }
#rb .rb-go:hover{ filter:brightness(1.08); transform:translateY(-1px); }
#rb .rb-go:active{ transform:translateY(0); }

/* close button (fluid) */
#rb .rb-x{
  appearance:none; border:0; background:transparent; cursor:pointer;
  color:#555;
  font-size: clamp(.95rem, .85rem + .4vw, 1rem);
  line-height:1;
  padding:.05rem .2rem;
}
#rb .rb-x:hover{ color:#000; }

/* stack neatly on small screens */
@media (max-width: 560px){
  #rb{
    flex-direction:column;
    align-items:flex-start;
    bottom: calc(env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px) + 70px);
    border-radius: 1rem;
    max-width: 92vw;
  }
  #rb .rb-go{ align-self:center; margin-top:.3rem; }
  #rb .rb-text{ max-width: 100%; }
}

/* very small screens: compress spacing a bit more */
@media (max-width: 380px){
  #rb{ gap:.35rem; }
  #rb .instructions br{ display:none; } /* keep it to one paragraph */
}

/* reduced motion */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion:reduce){
  #rb{ animation:none; }
}

/* dark mode */
.quarto-dark #rb{
  color:#dbe6f3; border-color:#253146;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#0f1320 0%,#0f1624 30%,#0f1b2d 50%,#0f1624 70%,#0f1320 100%);
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 8px rgba(255,215,0,.18);
}
.quarto-dark #rb .rb-go{ border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.2); }
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  const badge=document.getElementById('rb');
  const closeBtn=badge.querySelector('.rb-x');
  const startBtn=badge.querySelector('.rb-go');

  if(sessionStorage.getItem('rb-hide')==='1') badge.style.display='none';

  const hide=()=>{ badge.style.display='none'; sessionStorage.setItem('rb-hide','1'); };
  closeBtn.addEventListener('click', hide);
  startBtn.addEventListener('click', hide);
})();
</script>
```  
